allow: Bash(for f in bcRoles bcContactMethods bcTrainingRecords bcCompetencies)

Bash(printf 'import { useState, useEffect } from ""react"";\\nimport { useStore } from ""../store/useStore"";\\nimport { Plus, Search, User } from ""lucide-react"";\\n\\nexport function ContactDirectory\(\) {\\n const { bcPeople, fetchBCPeople } = useStore\(\);\\n const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState\(""""\);\\n\\n useEffect\(\(\) => { fetchBCPeople\(\); }, []\);\\n\\n const filtered = bcPeople.filter\(p =>\\n p.first_name.toLowerCase\(\).includes\(searchTerm.toLowerCase\(\)\) ||\\n p.last_name.toLowerCase\(\).includes\(searchTerm.toLowerCase\(\)\)\\n \);\\n\\n return \(\\n
\\n
\\n
\\n

Contact Directory

\\n

BC team contact information

\\n
\\n
\\n setSearchTerm\(e.target.value\)} className=""w-full px-4 py-2 bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-lg text-slate-100"" />\\n
\\n {filtered.map\(p => \(\\n
\\n
\\n \\n
\\n

{p.first_name} {p.last_name}

\\n

{p.job_title}

\\n
\\n
\\n
\\n {p.email &&

Email: {p.email}

}\\n {p.phone &&

Phone: {p.phone}

}\\n {p.department &&

Dept: {p.department}

}\\n
\\n
\\n \)\)}\\n
\\n
\\n \);\\n}\\n\\nexport default ContactDirectory;\\n')
